name: Charlie (Stevie257)
description:
Note: This project is more or less a proof of concept than an actual game. This is just to demonstrate the core features and story of a full featured Charlie game.

Your best friend's boyfriend is missing and its up to you to keep her from joining him with your only form of communication being a chat window.

There is a total of 4 endings, 2 good ones and 2 bad ones.
